description: Relationship tension system defining bidirectional dramatic forces between character pairs across multiple axes to create authentic interpersonal dynamics

tension_axis_framework.description: Each character relationship operates across multiple independent tension axes that create multidimensional dynamics
core_principles: Tension is bidirectional: Character A→B may differ from Character B→A
Multiple axes operate simultaneously; professional tension can coexist with personal harmony
Tension is not inherently negative; creative tension drives collaboration
Axes evolve based on shared experiences tracked in narrative
Zero tension = boring relationship; some tension on some axis is always present

axis_types.description: Standard tension axes for urban fantasy procedural relationships

high_tension.narrative_function: Creates obstacles, forces characters to compromise or prove themselves

manifestations: Mentor pushing mentee beyond comfort zone
Specialists deferring to each other's domains
moderate_tension.narrative_function: Generates interesting problem-solving dynamics without relationship damage

low_tension.narrative_function: Shows competence, allows focus on external conflicts
low_tension.caution: If too low for too long, relationship becomes static; introduce external pressure

bidirectional_notes.asymmetric_example: Veteran (A) to Rookie (B): Low tension, confident in teaching. Rookie (B) to Veteran (A): Moderate tension, proving competence
bidirectional_notes.symmetric_example: Two equal-rank detectives: Both moderate tension, competing for promotion

trust_axis.description: Reliability, honesty, and faith in the other person

manifestations: Won't rely on partner in critical moment
high_tension.narrative_function: Creates betrayal stakes, requires proof of trustworthiness
high_tension.caution: Cannot sustain 8+ tension while remaining partners; forces resolution or separation

manifestations: Trusts in some areas but not others
Tests partner with small risks before large ones
moderate_tension.narrative_function: Shows realistic relationship development; allows trust-building arc

low_tension.narrative_function: Allows characters to take risks together; external threats more impactful
low_tension.vulnerability: Deep trust creates leverage for villains; betrayal more devastating

trust_earning_rules.description: Trust cannot jump multiple levels without on-page justification
trust_earning_rules.progression: High→Moderate: 3-5 instances of reliable behavior. Moderate→Low: Life-or-death trust validation
trust_earning_rules.regression: Low→High: Single major betrayal. Moderate→High: Repeated small failures or one significant lie

personal_intimacy_axis.description: Emotional closeness, vulnerability, and friendship depth

high_tension.narrative_function: Characters must navigate work relationship despite personal friction
resolution_paths: Forced to work closely, discover common ground

manifestations: Share some personal details but not deep vulnerabilities
Support each other professionally, less so personally
moderate_tension.narrative_function: Allows gradual deepening; creates stakes as intimacy increases

low_tension.narrative_function: Makes threats to relationship devastating; creates powerful motivation
low_tension.vulnerability: Personal intimacy means hurting one impacts both

asymmetric_intimacy.description: One character may feel closer than the other
asymmetric_intimacy.example: Character A sees B as best friend (tension: 2), Character B sees A as close colleague (tension: 5)
asymmetric_intimacy.narrative_potential: Creates unspoken tension; eventual recognition/addressing of imbalance is powerful scene

romantic_attraction_axis.description: Romantic and sexual tension (optional axis; only present if relevant)

manifestations: Mutual attraction but can't act (workplace rules, existing relationships, etc.)
high_tension.narrative_function: Creates longing, near-misses, and eventual payoff when resolved

manifestations: Dating but keeping it quiet from team
New relationship, still figuring out dynamics
moderate_tension.narrative_function: Relationship affects case decisions; creates internal conflict

low_tension.narrative_function: Creates protective stakes; relationship becomes target
low_tension.caution: Risk of becoming boring; maintain other axes of tension, or introduce external relationship threat

presence_rules.description: This axis only exists if romantic potential is part of relationship
presence_rules.activation: Axis appears when first romantic moment occurs on-page
presence_rules.dissolution: Axis can permanently resolve to 0 (happily together) or be removed entirely (one party clearly not interested)

high_tension.narrative_function: Creates obstacles to collaboration; forces growth or separation

moderate_tension.narrative_function: Realistic workplace dynamics; allows growth moments

manifestations: Equal partners with natural leader emergence
low_tension.narrative_function: Allows efficient teamwork; hierarchy invisible in smooth operation
low_tension.caution: If hierarchy never tested, lacks realism; introduce stressor occasionally

power_hierarchy_axis.asymmetry_note: Always asymmetric; superior feels different hierarchy tension than subordinate

high_tension.description: Fundamental disagreement on values or methods
manifestations: Different views on magic use ethics
high_tension.narrative_function: Forces characters to articulate values; creates moral dilemmas
high_tension.caution: Cannot remain 9-10 tension long-term without partnership dissolving

moderate_tension.narrative_function: Creates rich dialogue and problem-solving scenes
moderate_tension.sweet_spot: Ideal for long-term partnerships; prevents groupthink, maintains interest

low_tension.narrative_function: Shows deep partnership; allows external focus
low_tension.caution: Too aligned = echo chamber; maintain some tension elsewhere

protective_investment_axis.description: How much emotional energy invested in other's wellbeing

high_tension.description: Deeply protective; partner's safety is priority
manifestations: Makes case decisions based on partner's safety
Willing to take bullet for partner
Partner's pain causes own emotional distress
high_tension.narrative_function: Creates vulnerability; villains exploit this care
high_tension.caution: High protective tension makes threats to partner extremely powerful story lever

moderate_tension.description: Professionally concerned but trusts partner's competence
manifestations: Watches partner's back in dangerous situations
Concerned when partner hurt but trusts recovery
Balances care with respect for autonomy
moderate_tension.narrative_function: Baseline partnership care without overwhelming other priorities

low_tension.description: Minimal emotional investment in partner's wellbeing
manifestations: Actively don't care (conflict on other axes)
Not close enough to be protective
low_tension.narrative_function: Shows early relationship or damaged relationship; room for growth

asymmetric_protection.description: Protection often asymmetric; mentor more protective of mentee than reverse
asymmetric_protection.narrative_use: Asymmetry reveals character priorities and relationship nature

tension_dynamics.description: How tension axes interact and evolve through narrative

multi_axis_states.description: Characters rarely have tension on only one axis

examples.description: Moderate tension across all axes; establishing relationship phase
Low tension except ideological (keeps interesting) and high protection (deep care)

examples.relationship: Antagonistic colleagues forced to work together
examples.description: High tension most axes; low protection shows lack of bond
Low tension most axes BUT high attraction tension + high protection = romantic tension

tension_evolution_triggers.description: Specific story events that shift tension levels

tension_rules.description: Governing principles for realistic tension evolution

rules.name: no-instant-shifts
rules.description: Tension cannot jump more than 3 points in single event unless catastrophic
rules.example: Partner lying doesn't instantly destroy deep trust (2→10); it damages trust (2→5), requires repair

rules.name: cascading-tension
rules.description: High tension on one axis affects others; purely professional relationship impossible when personal intimacy very low
rules.example: If personal intimacy 9 (actively dislike), professional tension minimum 5 (conflict bleeds into work)

rules.name: tension-requires-attention
rules.description: 8+ tension on any axis must be addressed within 3 chapters or relationship fractures
rules.example: Partners can't maintain 9 trust tension (active distrust) for 30k words; forces confrontation or separation

rules.name: zero-tension-danger
rules.description: If all axes drop to 0-2, relationship becomes narratively inert; introduce new tension
rules.example: Perfect partners need external stressor (one offered job elsewhere, moral dilemma splits them) to maintain story interest

rules.name: earned-tension-reduction
rules.description: Reducing tension requires on-page relationship work proportional to tension level
rules.example: Reducing trust tension from 8 to 4 requires 10k+ words of consistent trustworthy behavior shown on-page

visualization_data_model.description: Data structure for Interactive Tension Axis Graph component

romantic_attraction.a_to_b: number (0-10) OR null if axis not present
romantic_attraction.b_to_a: number (0-10) OR null if axis not present

partner_dynamics.description: Detective partnerships are core relationship in procedural
common_arcs: Hostile to reluctant to functional to protective (classic buddy cop)
Partners to betrayal to redemption (trust arc)

magical_hierarchy_tension.description: Urban fantasy adds magical competence hierarchy
magical_hierarchy_tension.tension_source: Non-magical partnered with magical, or different magical traditions
axes_affected: Professional (magical partner more effective in supernatural cases)
Ideological (different views on magic use ethics)

tension_sources: Can't share case details (personal intimacy limited)
Danger to civilian loved ones (protective investment high, creates guilt)
Moral weight of job not understood by civilians (ideological distance)

agent_integration.dr_viktor: Primary validator for relationship dynamics and emotional authenticity of tension
agent_integration.bailey: References tension axes during drafting; ensures character interactions reflect current tension levels
agent_integration.tessa: Tracks tension evolution across chapters; validates consistency and earned changes
agent_integration.miranda: Oversees relationship arcs across series; ensures tension serves story

tracked_values.threshold: 100% of ±3 or greater shifts have on-page event
No relationships with all axes 0-2 for >5 chapters
Power and protection axes must be asymmetric
High tension one axis affects related axes appropriately
